name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

name: Introduction to Astrodynamics
description: Basic principles of astrodynamics and celestial mechanics.

name: Orbit Determination
description: Methods for determining and predicting spacecraft orbits.

name: Space Navigation
description: Techniques for spacecraft navigation and position control.

name: Kepler's Laws
description: Understanding Kepler's laws and their relevance to orbital mechanics.

name: Hohmann Transfers
description: Study of Hohmann transfer orbits for interplanetary missions.

name: Orbital Perturbations
description: Analysis of orbital perturbations and their effects on spacecraft orbits.

name: Rocket Propulsion Advanced Topics
description: Advanced concepts in rocket propulsion and propulsion systems.

name: Rocket Design and Optimization
description: Optimizing rocket designs for specific mission requirements.

name: Rocket Testing and Performance Analysis
description: Methods for testing rocket engines and analyzing their performance.

name: Space Environment and Effects
description: Study of the space environment and its effects on spacecraft.

name: Radiation Protection
description: Methods for protecting spacecraft and astronauts from radiation.

name: Space Weather Forecasting
description: Forecasting and mitigation of space weather impacts on space missions.

name: Spacecraft Subsystems
description: In-depth study of spacecraft subsystems and their integration.

name: Mission Design and Planning
description: Planning and designing spacecraft missions for various objectives.

name: Spacecraft Testing and Integration
description: Methods for testing and integrating spacecraft components and systems.
